Class Coordinate

java.lang.Object
  Coordinate

public class Coordinate
extends java.lang.Object

Encapsulates coordinate points in a two dimensional cartesian plane

Version:
1.0
Author:
Matthew Pak, Sydney Desai, Nick Meyer

Constructor Summary
Coordinate(Coordinate c, double dist, int theta)
          Constructs a coordinate the given distance away from the given coordinate at angle theta
Coordinate(int x, int y)
          Constructs a coordinate with the given x and y arguments

static int angleConverter(int angle, boolean toReal)
          if toReal, converts game notation to real notation, otherwise real notation to game notation
 int angleToward(Coordinate other)
          returns the angle (in degrees) formed by the y axis and the ray connecting this coordinate and the other (the same way as gridworld)
